Instruction: 'Tear the iceberg lettuce into bite-sized pieces.'
'Finely chop the red onion and cilantro.'
In a large bowl, combine torn iceberg lettuce, sliced grilled chicken breast, diced avocado, halved cherry tomatoes, chopped red onion, and chopped cilantro.'
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and black pepper to make the dressing.'
